title: BLOOD MOON; Sharing experiences
body:
Hey guys,I'm just wondering about you experience on Blood Moon.

What's favorite champion to play there?
Which champion do you feel is the strongest?
Which champions is the weakest?
Which champions is really annoying to face?
Which champion do you hate having on your team?

replies.body:
{{champion:80}} for easy wins... nobody can stop him...

I wish i can use Jax tho.
Why do you want us to suffer?

Generally I play AP Shaco. You can do some pretty neat stuff with his boxes. (Like Say, AFK farm spirits) And with his clone, he has a better time soloing the demon herald. 

Generally, I don't care what champs you pick. But I usually hate the people who insist on grouping. (Unless it's to contest Herald) Since I don't find Shaco to be a particularly good teamfighter or duelist, I generally choose hit and run tactics. (sneak into jungle, farm spirits, get out, Get kill using bloodmoon buff, rinse and repeat.) I also hate it when my peeps don't make use of my boxes. (they can save your life from time to time)

favorite- zed, that splat on the ulty is as satisfying as jhins 4th shot

strongest- riven (if you're good at animation canceling)

weakest- eve, i just havent seen her do well tbh

annoying- shaco, nuf said

who i dont wana see- leblanc, mostly cuz my friend who plays her goes horribly negative

all in all its my favorite game type yet

Riven is simply too strong for the game mode. Having CC ,burst and mobility in that mode is really good for her.
Ye.Shaco is really annoying.

I love Eve.She's so much fun.
when it comes back, i wana see renekton, he fits just about aswell as riven does
